ocean.question: I have many arms, but I can't hug. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I live underwater.
🎨 I can sometimes change colors.
🖐️ I have more than two arms.

ocean.question: I'm a very large mammal that lives in the ocean, known for my singing. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a lot of noise.
🐳 I am very big.
🚢 Boats are smaller than me.

ocean.question: I’m a colorful fish, small and bright, you might find me hiding in a sea anemone. What am I?

hints.text: 🐡 My home is also a creature.
🧡 I'm orange, white, and black.
🏠 Nemo lives with me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and crawl slowly on the ocean floor.

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🐌 I am very slow.
🥬 I like to eat plants.

ocean.question: I'm a type of water that covers most of the Earth. I'm salty and have waves.

hints.text: 🗺️ I separate continents.
💧 Ships travel on me.
🧂 I taste salty.

ocean.question: I am a type of fish with a flat body and eyes on one side. I lie on the bottom of the sea.

hints.text: 👀 My eyes are on one side.
➖ I blend in with the sea floor.
🥞 I am shaped like a pancake.

ocean.question: I'm a small, bright colored, hard object found on the beach. Some people collect me.

hints.text: 👂 You can hear the ocean in me (maybe!).
🐚 I used to be someone's home.
🏖️ You can find me in the sand.

ocean.question: I am a large, slow-moving reptile that lives in the ocean and lays my eggs on the beach.

hints.text: 🐢 I have a hard shell.
🌿 I eat seaweed.
🏝️ I visit beaches to leave my eggs.

ocean.question: I am a very large and powerful ocean current that affects the climate of Europe.

hints.text: 🌡️ I bring warm water from the Gulf.
🌎 I am important for world climate.
🌊 I am a current.

ocean.question: I am a group of tiny plants that float on the surface of the ocean and produce most of the world's oxygen.

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunlight to live.
🌊 I am the base of the ocean food chain.
🌬️ I create the air we breathe.

food.question: I am yellow, long, and curved. Monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 A popular fruit for monkeys
💛 I'm often yellow when ripe
〰️ I grow on trees in bunches

food.question: I am a red fruit with seeds on the outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🍓 I'm often used in desserts
❤️ My seeds are on the outside
☀️ I'm small and sweet

food.question: I am white and fluffy when cooked, and I come from a hen. What am I?

hints.text: 🍳 I'm often cooked for breakfast
🐔 Hens lay me
⚪ I have a yellow yolk inside

food.question: I am long and orange, and bunnies love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 Bunnies are known to enjoy me
🧡 I am a root vegetable
🌱 I grow in the ground

food.question: I am white and sweet, and I come from a cow. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I can be used to make cheese and yogurt
🐄 Cows produce me
🥣 You can drink me with cereal

food.question: I'm a round, green vegetable that grows in a pod. What am I?

hints.text: 🟢 Sometimes found in soups or stir-fries
🧑‍🌾 I grow in a shell
🥣 I can be mushy or hard

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast, and I'm baked in an oven. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 I can be used to make sandwiches
🔥 I need heat to be created
🌾 Grains are my friend

food.question: I am a fruit that can be red, green, or yellow, and I grow on trees. An apple a day, keeps the doctor away. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Snow White loved me
🌳 I grow on a tree
🩺 An old saying involves me and doctors

food.question: I am a juicy fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I'm a good source of Vitamin C
🟤 My skin is fuzzy and brown
🟢 My flesh is usually green

food.question: I am a drink that is brown, bubbly, and sweet. I am often served cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🥤 I can be fizzy
🐻 Some bears are associated with me in advertising.
🧊 I am often served with ice
